title: Currency Optimization, Innovation, and National Savings Act of 2017
content: Currency Optimization, Innovation, and National Savings Act of 2017 This bill suspends the production of one-cent coins, other than collectible coins,nbsp. For a 10-year period. The Government Accountability Office shall study the effect of this temporary suspension and report on whether production should remain suspended. In addition, the bill provides for: (1)nbsp, modifications to thenbsp, composition of the five-cent coin, and (2) the replacement, in circulation,nbsp, of $1 notes with $1 coins.
